channel.title: Help Please!
channel.description: how can i make a server starter of me server ?

item.title: Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @santaher0 santaher0
item.description:
@santaher0 wrote:

hm, maybe you just can download a good source base!

in it , their will be always a runserver.bat file

than you can give it a try

K Jay

[quote=“K Jay, post:2, topic:230526”]This is my starter u can add it to ur commands

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 500000000);
addItem(386, 100000);
addItem(554, 100000);
addItem(555, 100000);
addItem(556, 100000);
addItem(557, 100000);
addItem(558, 100000);
addItem(559, 100000);
addItem(560, 100000);
addItem(561, 100000);
addItem(562, 100000);
addItem(563, 100000);
addItem(564, 100000);
addItem(565, 100000);
addItem(566, 100000);
addItem(892, 10000);
addItem(5698, 1);;
sendMessage(“ur0wned v3 Starter Package”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " is gay and proud!");

        }
    }[/code][/quote]

if you give someone this code, don’t forget , that they also need to put the PUBLIC INT STARTER in their client or handler

Read full topic

Ooh! Add a new file like the “run file” ore compile and paste this in it

color 0a
title Allstar-Scape v1
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

item.title: Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @K_Jay K Jay
item.description:
@K_Jay wrote:

This is my starter u can add it to ur commands

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 500000000);
addItem(386, 100000);
addItem(554, 100000);
addItem(555, 100000);
addItem(556, 100000);
addItem(557, 100000);
addItem(558, 100000);
addItem(559, 100000);
addItem(560, 100000);
addItem(561, 100000);
addItem(562, 100000);
addItem(563, 100000);
addItem(564, 100000);
addItem(565, 100000);
addItem(566, 100000);
addItem(892, 10000);
addItem(5698, 1);;
sendMessage(“ur0wned v3 Starter Package”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " is gay and proud!");

        }
    }[/code]
